I'd say from the looks of it; our naked buddy is moving.

And we're done with the chicken fried rice.
Hey! Hey! If he's moving, maybe I should try to get his place!
Good idea! Yes!
It would be so cool to live across from you guys!

Hey, yeah! Then we could do that telephone thing! Y'know, you have a can,
we have a can and it's connected by a string!
Or we can do the

Well that is because your eye immediately goes to the big naked man.

It's amazing! You better hurry up and fill out an application or I'm

(laughing) Ohh. (Phoebe takes a couple of steps to the door and Ross

Well, I never thought I'd say this, but I'm gonna go use Ugly Naked
Guy's bathroom. (Does so.)

(looking out the window) Oh, look! There's Monica and Chandler! (Starts

Oh my God!
OH MY GOD!!!

I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!
YOU KNOW?!!!

Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn't know so you have to stop

(entering) What's going on?
Ohhh!!!

(trying to divert his attention from the window by jumping up and down)
HI!! Hi!
What?! What?!

Nothing! Oh God, we're just so excited that you want to get this

Actually, it looks really good. (Turns towards the window and now Phoebe

(Screaming incoherently.) Get in here!!! (Motions to join her and
Rachel.)

You mean whenever Monica and Chandler where like y'know doing laundry or

from camp!
Uh-huh, doing it. Doing it. Phone doing it.

Oh! Oh, I can't believe it! I mean I think it's great! For him. She

(entering) Hey guys!
Joey! Come here! Come here!
What? What?
Phoebe just found out about Monica and Chandler.
You mean how they're friends and nothing more? (Glares at Rachel.)
No. Joey, she

Okay, so now they know that you know and they don't know that Rachel

Yes, but y'know what? It doesn't matter who knows what. Now, enough of us

Or, we could
Wh-what do you mean?

Well y'know every time that they say that like they're doing laundry

Ohhh, I-I would enjoy that!

No-no-no! No-no wait Rach, you know what would even be more fun? Telling

Ehhh, no, I wanna do Phoebe's thing.
I can't take any…
No! You don't have to do anything! Just don't tell them that we know!

Noo! I can't take any more secrets! (To Rachel) I've got your secrets.
I've got their secrets. I got secrets of my own y'know!
You don't have any secrets!

Oh yeah? Well, you don't know about Hugsy, my bedtime penguin pal. (Joey
shies away.)
(To Phoebe) So umm, how-how are we gonna mess with them?
Ugh.
Well, you could use your position y'know as the roommate.
Okay.

And then. I would use y'know the strongest tool at my disposal. My
sexuality.
(entering) Hello children!
Hey!
Okay, watch, learn, and don't eat my cookie.
Hey.
Hey! Ooh, wow that jacket looks great on you!
Really?

(feels his arm) Yeah the material feels so soft—hello Mr. Bicep!
Have you been working out?

Well, I try to y'know, squeeze things. (Phoebe giggles
uncontrollably.) Are you okay?
Well, if you really wanna know, I'm—Oh! I can't tell you this.
Phoebe, it's me. You can tell me anything.

Well actually you're the one person I can't tell this too. And the one

What's going on?

I think it's just y'know that I haven't been with a guy in so long and
how sometimes you're looking for something and you just don’t even see that it's

something to think about. I know I will.
You are so cute! How did you get to be so cute?

Well, my Grandfather was Swedish and my Grandmother was actually a

Okay, now you're even cuter!!
Y'know that is a popular opinion today I must say.
What?

The weirdest thing happened at the coffee house, I think, I think
Phoebe was hitting on me.
What are you talking about?
I'm telling you I think Phoebe thinks I'm foxy.
That's not possible!
Ow!

I'm sorry it's just, Phoebe just always thought you were, you were

Oh, y'know I-I can't hear that enough.
I'm sorry, I think that you just misunderstood her.

No, I didn't misunderstand, okay? She was all over me! She touched my

This bicep?
Well it's not flexed right now!
Hey Mon, what are you doing now? Wanna come see a movie with us?
Uhh, y'know actually I was gonna do some laundry.
Oh.
Hey Chandler, wanna do it with me?
Sure, I'll do it with ya.
Okay.

Okay great, hold on a sec! (She runs to her room and returns carrying a

a lot! Thanks!
I mean I-I don't I think I have enough quarters.
I have quarters! (She holds up a bag of quarters.)
(entering) Hey!
Hey Ross! Any word on the apartment yet?

Well, I called over there and it turns out Ugly Naked Guy is subletting it

Oh.

No-no, I got the edge. I know it's not exactly ethical but I sent him a
little bribe to
Oh, is it that pinball machine with the big bow on it?
No.
That new mountain bike?
No.
Well what did you send?
A basket of mini-muffins.

But there's a whole table of mini-muffin baskets. Which one did you

The small one.

What?! You-you actually thought that basket was gonna get you the

Well yeah! Someone sent us a basket at work once and people went crazy

Your work makes me sad.

Oh man! I want that place so much!! I was so sure that was gonna work!
There's twelve bucks I'll never see again! (Exits.)
All right honey, we'd better go if we wanna catch that movie.
Bye!
Bye!

Bye Chandler! (She walks up to him.) (Quietly.) I miss you already. (She

(after they've left) Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate
and the pinching!!
Actually, I did!
Okay, so now do you believe that she's attracted to me?
Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!

(a little hurt) Okay but what about y'know my pinchable butt and my

(entering) Joey!
Yeah?
Phoebe knows about us!
Well
Them?! Who's them?
Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.
Joey!
And Rachel. I would've told you but they made me promise not to tell!
Oh man!

I'm sorry! But hey, it's over now, right? Because you can tell them that
you know they know and
Unless…
No! Not unless! Look this must end now!
Oh man, they think they are so
Ahh yes, the messers become the messies!
Noooo.
Oh Ross, honey you gotta stop torturing yourself!
Yeah, why don't you just find another apartment?

Y'know what you should do?
Huh?

You should find out what his hobbies are and then use that to bond with

I'm listening.
(To Ross) See?

That is a great idea! And! I know Ugly Naked Guy because we've been
watching him for like five years so
He broke that.
Well, he had gravity boots.
Yeah, he broke those too.
So he likes to break stuff.

Okay, I've got to go pick up Ben but I-I will figure something out. (He
opens the door and stops.) Hey, didn't he used to have a cat?
I wouldn't bring that up, it would probably just bum him out.
Yeah, poor cat, never saw that big butt coming.
Right. (Exits.)

Hello! (Listens) Oh yeah! Hey! Hold on a second she's right here! (To

(in a sexy voice) Oh? (Takes the phone from Rachel.) Hello you.

Hello Phoebe, I've been thinking about you all day. (He's holding the
phone so that Monica can hear it as well.)
Eh?

Well you know that thing you said before, I'd be lying if I said I
wasn't intrigued.
Really?

Yeah, listen, Joey isn't gonna be here tonight so why don't you come

I'll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! (Hangs up.) Oh my God!
He wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!
Are you kidding?!
No!

I can not believe he would do that to Mon—Whoa! (She stops suddenly
and slowly turns to point at Joey. Joey is avoiding her eyes.) Joey, do they know that we
know?
No.
Joey!
They know you know.
Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!

God, they thought they can mess with us! They're trying to mess with
us?! They don't know that we know they know we know! (Joey just shakes his head.) Joey,
you can't say anything!
I couldn't even if I wanted too.

Good evening, sir. My name is Ross Geller. I'm one of the people who
applied for the apartment. And I-I realize that the competition is fierce but—I'm
sorry. I, I can't help but notice you're naked and (He claps his hands.) I applaud you.
Man, I wish I was naked. I mean, this-this looks so great. That is how God intended it.
(in the kitchen with Chandler) Look at them, they're-they're panicked!
Oh yeah, they're totally gonna back down!
Oh yeah!

All right. All right! If he wants a date? He's gonna get a date. All
right, I'm gonna go in.
All right. Be sexy.
(laughs) Please.
So Chandler, I-I'd love to come by tonight.
(initially worried, but gets over it) Really?
Oh absolutely. Shall we say, around seven?
Yes.

Good. I'm really looking forward to you and me having sexual
intercourse.

(looking out the window) Hey-hey, check it out! Check it out! Ugly Naked
Guy has a naked friend!
Oh yeah! (She gasps.) Oh my God! That is
Yeah, it is! Naked Ross!!
Show time!
Okay, Rachel, get me perfume!
Okay! (She runs to get some.)

And Joey, get me a bottle of wine and glasses? (He begrudgingly does

All right, it'll be great! You just make her think you wanna have sex

Okay, listen, how far am I gonna have to go with her?
Relax, she-she's gonna give in way before you do!
How do you know?!
Because you're on my team! And my team always wins!
At this?!
Just go get some! (Kisses him.) Go! (She runs to hide in the bathroom.)

(handing her the wine) Okay honey, now I'm gonna try to listen from

Okay.
Okay? Whoa, wait! (She undoes one button on Phoebe's dress.)
Good idea!
Yeah, oh wait! (She goes for another one.)
Oh now, don't give away the farm!
Phoebe.
Chandler.
Come on in.

I was going too. (They go inside and he closes the door.) Umm, I brought

Sure.
So, here we are. Nervous?
Me? No. You?
No, I want this to happen.
So do I.
I'm gonna put on some music.

Maybe, maybe I'll dance for you. (She starts doing a rather suggestive

You look good.

Thanks! Y'know, that when you say things like that it makes me wanna rip

Well, why don't we move this into the bedroom?
Really?
Oh, do you not want to?

No. No! It's just y'know first, I wanna take off all my clothes and have

Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put

She's bluffing!

Look, she's not backing down! She went like this! (He does a little

Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler

Ooh!
Okay!

Can't work 'em! (He swiftly rips open the front of Phoebe's dress revealing her bra.)

It's not my first time.
You go back out there and you seduce her till she cracks!
Okay, give me a second! (Pause) Did you clean up in here?
Of course.
Oh, you're-you're going?

Umm, not without you, lover. (She slowly walks over to him and is

(swallowing hard) It's very, very nice. Well, come here. I'm very were

You should be. I'm very bendy. (Pause) I'm gonna kiss you now.
Not if I kiss you first.
Ooh.
Well, I guess there's nothing left for us to do but-but kiss.
Here it comes. Our first kiss.
Okay! Okay! Okay! You win! You win!! I can't have sex with ya!
And why not?!
Because I'm in love with Monica!!
You're-you're what?!

Love her! That's right, I…LOVE…HER!!! I love her!! (They

I love you too Chandler. (They kiss.)

I just—I thought you guys were doing it, I didn't know you were in
love!
Dude!

And hats off to Phoebe. Quite a competitor. (Pause) And might I say
your breasts are still showing.
God! (She turns and buttons up.)
All right! So that's it! It's over! Everybody knows!
Well actually, Ross doesn't.
Yes, and we'd appreciate it if no one told him yet.

A new place for a new Ross. I'm gonna have you and all the guys from work
over once it's y'know, furnished.
I must say it's nice to see you back on your feet.
Well I am that. And that whole rage thing is definitely behind me.
I wonder if its time for you to rejoin our team at the museum?

Oh Donald that-that would be great. I am totally ready to come back to
work. I—What? (He notices something through the window.) No! Wh… What are you
doing?!! (Dr. Ledbetter is slowly backing away.)
